text: Francisco José Pereira Pinto Balsemão (; born 1 September 1937 in Lisbon), is a Portuguese businessman, former journalist and retired politician. He served as Prime Minister of Portugal, from 1981 to 1983. ==Other websites== * Francisco Pinto Balsemao in GeneAll.net Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:Portuguese businesspeople Category:Journalists Category:Politicians from Lisbon Category:Prime ministers of Portugal
title: Francisco Pinto Balsemão
